title: app/jsLibs
description: JS libraries definitions for the loader.

path.description: A path to the lib file.

devPath.description: A path to the lib file for the developer mode.

exportsTo.description: If the lib exposes itself w/o a module, to where the lib is exported. Use dots to define a path.

exportsAs.description: A key name by which the lib is available in a containing object.

sourceMap.description: Whether the source map file is available.

expose.description: To expose to the window global. To be used for backward compatibility reasons.

exposeAs.description: A name to expose by. By default, matches the lib name.

amdId.description: An AMD ID. If the module uses a named define function, specify that name.
